Headline: #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clarendon/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine, Wilson and Clarendon: due to, street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine, Wilson and Clarendon: due to, street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier Bridge Lift at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier Bridge Lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
